Waste to Wealth: 'Ebe ndị ọzọ na-ahụ komkom mmanya, ana m ahụ ihe nka' - Ifedilichukwu
Onye dere ya, Chukwunaeme Obiejesi na Amaka Bassey
Ndị mere akụkọ a,  Journalist na Digital Technical Producer
Twitter, @Chukwunaeme1
Ebeg o si  Lagos
Ọgọọst 2023
Nka na mma dị n'ihe niile n'ụwa, kama ọ bụ naanị anya a zụrụ nke ọma nwereike ịhụ mma ọbụladị n'ikpo atịtị.
Otu a ka ọ dị maka nwa okorobịa na-eme ihe nka aha ya bụ Chibuike Ifedilichukwu, onye na-eji komkom mmanya a tụfuru atụfu emepụta ihe nka na-agba ọtụtụ mmadụ gharịị.
Ifedilichukwu na-eji komkom mmanya ndị ọ tụtụtara n'okporoụzọ maọbụ n'ikpo ahịhịa ekepụta eserese mmadụ, nke na onye ọbụla hụrụ ya ga-amata onye e jiri ya see.
Ọgba mbọ: Nwamadị ji atịtị akwa nka, lee ka o si eme ya12 Mee 2021
AI in Music: Etu m si jiri AI mepụta nwaada na-etiri m egwu ma na-enye m mbada ego - Nkasiobi Chukwu 22 Julaị 2023
Chikasielu dị afọ asaa ma ọ bụ ọkaibe n'ịtụ ilu Igbo11 Julaị 2021

N'ọdị nso a, Ifedilichukwu emepụtala eserese Chimamanda Adichie, bụ odeakwụkwọ a ma ama n'ụwa; Michael Ajere bụ otiegwu a ma ama dịka 'Don Jazzy; ọkpa ọchị Samuel Perry, onye a ma dịka 'Broda Shaggi'; Peter Obi, bụbu gọvanọ Anambra Steeti Naịjirịa; otiegwu David Adeleke, onye a ma dịka 'Davido', na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ.
Ọrụ ya efesakwaala na soshal midia Naịjirịa maka na ọ na-atụ ndị mmadụ n'anya etu nwata nwoke a si eji ihe ụwa jụrụ ajụ emepụta ihe bụ sọ mma.
"Enwerem nkwenye na ihe niile dị n'ụwa mara mma. Nka dịkwa n'ebe ọbụla i lere anya, mana ọ bụ naanị onye nwere ndidi ga-ewepụta mma dị n'ihe niile," Ifedilichukwu kwuru na mkparịtaụka ya na BBC Igbo.
"Komkom mmanya abụghị ihe mbụ ndị mmadụ na-akpọ atịtị nke m na-eji emepụta ihe nka, ndị ọzọ gụnyere karama mmanya, ụkwụ taya ụgbọala, na ọtụtụ ihe ndị ọzọ."
Ebe foto si, Ifediriuwamma
Ifedilichukwu kwuru na ihe kacha anụ ya ọkụ n'obi bụ ịchọ ụzọ iji belata mmetọ gburugburu bụ nke so akpata mgbanwe ihu eligwe.
Ọ mụtara nke a site n'aka mama nnukwu ya bụ Asamma, onye kuziir ya kamgbe ọ bụ nwata etu e si ahazi atịtị tupu ekpofuo ha.
"Na be anyị, anyị na-ahazi atịtị nke ọma, wepụ ndị na-akụwa akụwa iche, wepụ ndị anaghị ere ure iche, ma wepụkwa ndị na-ere ure iche tupu e kpofuo ha," Ifedilichukwu kọwara.
Taa, ọzụzụ a Asamma nyere ya akụnyela mkpụrụ ịdebe gburugburu ọcha n'ime Ifedirichukwu, nke mere ka ọ na-etinyekwa ọzụzụ a n'ọrụ ya dịka onye nka.
Mana Ifedilichukwu nwekwara ọzụzụ na ngalaba ihe nka site na mahadum 'Institute of Management and Technology' n' Enugwu.
Gere akụkọ Ifedilichukwu na nka ya pụrụ iche n'onyonyo dị n'elu.
Gburugburu
Nka
Klaimet chanji
